articles.content:

articles.title: Chad Schofield continues hot run in Hong Kong as Moreira rides treble - Racenet
articles.description: “I do feel like I’m probably riding as well as I ever have,” Schofield said. “It’s just flowing along nicely but it’s a combination of getting some better quality rides and obviously my confidence is high on the back of the winners.
articles.content:
Australian jockey Chad Schofield has continued his rich vein of form and remains on track for a career year in Hong Kong after riding a treble on Sunday.
Schofield is now just four wins shy of a career best of 38 wins in a season following another strong day… [+1892 chars]

articles.description: A jumps jockey was banned for a month for improper riding at Sunday’s Pakenham meeting.
articles.content:
A jumps jockey was banned for a month for improper riding at Sunday’s Pakenham meeting.
